decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The building hereby permitted shall only be in use on a temporary basis in association with the Strand on the Green Infant and Nursery School.  The proposed use shall cease and the land restored to its former condition on or before the 1st August 2015 in accordance with a scheme of work submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (130044/A-SK01 REV B received on the 23.04.2014  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted for a temporary building associated with the Strand on the Green Infant and Nursery School shall not be in use outside the following times, 0800hours to 1600hours, Monday to Friday (during school term only).  The temporary building, shall not be use during bank holidays, school holidays or weekends.

Condition : 5 - Any external plant shall not operate outside the hours of 0800 hours to 1600hours, Monday to Friday (during school term only).  The air conditioning units, shall not be in use during bank holidays, school holidays or weekends

Condition : 6 - The level of noise emitted from any external plant shall not exceed 10dB below background noise level as measured from the nearest sensitive noise location in accordance with BS4142:1997
Condition : 7 - The proposed use of the air conditioning units, shall be used in accordance with the submitted noise impact assessment for the air conditioning units.
Condition : 8 - Notwithstanding the approved plans, the proposed kitchen area within the proposed temporary building shall not be used for hot food cooking facilities.
description: Demolition of existing community block C and installation of new temporary classroom unit until August 2015
